summary: The package contains two example scripts that train a Deep Convolutional Generative Adversarial Network (DCGAN) on the CelebA face dataset. One script uses plain PyTorch for a simple, single‑node training loop, while the other leverages Lightning Fabric to accelerate the same workflow, supporting optional distributed execution, automatic checkpointing, and periodic sample generation.
business_intent: Showcase how to build and scale GAN training pipelines, illustrate the benefits of Lightning Fabric for faster and distributed deep‑learning workloads, and provide a ready‑to‑run reference for image synthesis applications.
